cover_letter:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am excited to apply for the Data Scientist position available at your esteemed company. My name is Geoffrey Wong and I am a Full-Stack Data Scientist with a strong background in computer science. As a previous AI Developer Intern at Flying Milk Tea, I have acquired a deep understanding of the field and exceptional problem-solving skills that help me excel and deliver outstanding results.

I noticed that your company's mission is to leverage cutting-edge AI and Machine Learning techniques to create insightful solutions for businesses. As a passionate Data Scientist, I truly believe that data is the key to unlocking valuable insights and driving growth across all industries. Moreover, I feel that it is more important than ever before to use ML and AI technologies to pioneer the future of business. I strongly believe that I possess both the technical and soft skills necessary to thrive in this role.

I am confident that my previous experience and a range of skills, including my proficiency in Machine Learning Frameworks such as Pytorch, Keras, and Scikit-learn, could make me a valuable addition to the team. Moreover, my relevant experience lies in developing models to extract sentiment analysis, interests classification, and keyword extraction. A notable accomplishment was training deep learning models to predict insurance fraud, enabling scalable and automated data processing, and producing exceptional insights to stakeholders. I am eager to apply my expertise and work towards helping your company achieve its goals and purpose.

I have noticed on your website that your company has been actively exploring ways to improve sales, but the abundance of data is not as attractive to the audience. I believe my experience in data visualization using Tableau, Looker Studio, and Power BI can help showcase this data in a user-friendly manner and make it more appealing and understandable to customers. I am confident that by combining my expertise in the field with your data, we can better understand how to offer a personalized experience to each customer and stay ahead  in the competitive market.

Thank you for taking the time to consider my application. I am excited to bring my passion for Data Science to your company, and contribute to your journey towards creating innovative solutions.

Sincerely,

Geoffrey Wong
